resources.string: Please contact your kernel dev and ask them to add Spectrum support
Root access was not found or denied. Spectrum needs root to set profiles.
Storage permission denied, Couldn\'t look for custom descriptions
The default Electron kernel profile, known for its smooth performance in basic tasks while maintaining fantastic battery.
Tuned for top tier performance in standard tasks with many less regressions than Balanced, but maintains battery by limiting graphics.
Ultra-conservative profile that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life.
Need that extra 10 FPS? I gotchu. Identical to performance in most areas other than the unlocked Graphics performance
